SamPy.bolshoi.collecthalomassesThreading.findDMhaloes¶

class SamPy.bolshoi.collecthalomassesThreading.findDMhaloes(queue, times)¶

Threaded way of finding dark matter haloes from Bolshoi isotree files.

__init__(queue, times)¶

Initialize the class instance. :param queue :param times

Methods

__init__(queue, times) Initialize the class instance.
find(file) Find all dark matter haloes from a given file that are in self.times.

isAlive()
